en-US.label: Nice words
en-US.description: These words will be excluded from the readability check

en-US.label: Naughty words
en-US.description: These words should never be used

en-US.label: Run Preflight on save
en-US.description: Set to true and Preflight will run on all saves, and alert users to any errors.

en-US.label: Cancel save when Preflight tests fail
en-US.description: Set to true and Preflight will cancel the save event, if tests fail and Preflight is set to run on save.

en-US.label: Properties to test
en-US.description: Restrict Preflight to a subset of testable properties

en-US.label: User group opt in/out
en-US.description: Select user groups to opt in to testing
